long_description: This 1 fl. oz. polyethylene container with polypropylene squirt cap is great for carrying kitchen or bath essentials such as cooking oil or shampoo. 0.75" diameter screw-on lid has a lift up squirt tab to dispense liquids in small, controlled amounts. Bottle is recyclable at the end of its long life. Compact size is ideal for backpacking, camping or travel.
short_description: This 1 fl. oz. polyethylene container with polypropylene squirt cap is great for carrying kitchen or bath essentials such as cooking oil or shampoo.
